data.message: Ask and thou shall receive. I ask for nothing but this, I guess I'm just blessed to day today is going to a great day. Okay let me lay this down for you Eminem.  Em you want to battle? I'll win.  Listen here slim,shady maybe I'm just crazy, n but how about you rap about me without saying anything bad about me, and don't use the word crazy... Eminem says, " huh huh" lol... No jk all in all I'm just trapped in your medicine ball
